item.title: I-10 West - Exit 22
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 22 - NM-494/Main St.

item.title: NM-494 North at US-70/BL-10/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north at US-70/BL-10/NM-90. US-70/NM-90 split off BL-10 here towards Silver City.

item.title: NM-494 North at BL-10/US-70/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north at BL-10/US-70 and NM-90.

item.title: NM-494 North Approaching BL-10/US-70
item.description: NM-494 north approaching BL-10 and US-70.

item.title: NM-494 North To US-70/NM-90
item.description: NM-494 north to US-70/NM-90 in Lordsburg.

item.title: I-10 East at Exit 22 Offramp
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22 offramp at NM-494 junction. Use NM-494 north for BL-10/US-70/NM-90.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 22
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 22 - NM-494/Main St.

item.title: I-10 East Approaching Exit 22
item.description: I-10 east approaching Exit 22. Use Exit 22 for Silver City (via NM-90) and Globe, AZ (via US-70).
